Title: Establishes a board of trustees to administer the accountants' fund for client protection of the state of New York; appropriation
Summary: Establishes a board of trustees to administer the accountants' fund for client protection of the state of New York; establishes the accountant's fund for client protection of the state of New York; relates to registration fees for accountants; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add §7403-a, amd §§7404 & 7405, Ed L; add §97-u, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the establishment of a board of trustees to administer the accountants' fund for client protection of the state of New York; to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the accountants' fund for client protection of the state of New York; to amend the education law, in relation to registration fees for accountants; and making an appropriation therefor
